title: Weekly Review with Clay and Buck H3 - Apr 9 2022
itunes:title: Weekly Review with Clay and Buck H3 - Apr 9 2022
description:
Democrats fight to indoctrinate your kids with the gay agenda, focusing on issues that are going to get them beaten even worse in the midterms. Besides noting that, "Democrats are picking the worst possible battles to fight," Clay also revealed that a Disney chief of content said, "she had a transexual and a pansexual child. And I had no idea what pansexual meant. I'm not making it up. No earthly idea." Obama's DHS Secretary Jeh Johnson issues dire border warning. Shanghai covid craziness: "Curb your desire for freedom!" Their use of drones to tell people not to sing from windows or to sleep next to their spouses prompted Buck to say, "Fauci would be so proud" and probably wishes we would implement a drone force for personal freedom-reducing measures as well.

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
